content.detailedDescription: My  wife and i noticed this last night, december 11th 2013 over encinitas ca. it was around 8pm as we were walking to dinner.  we first noticed the object because we were trying to find stars to look at.  my first instinct was this is a normal commercial jetliner. after about ten seconds that quickly changed and i grabbed my camera phone. the object was entirely stationary for at least twenty minutes. we stood there for about ten looking at it and spent another ten walking to dinner. the object was still in the sky before we walked into the restaurant, although i cant confirm if it moved or not since my field of view changed so much from walking. the object appeared circular and had three roaring lights that were moving rather quickly.  the lights were magenta and a light green and occasionally transitioned into adding a yellow light into the rotating motion. the even crazier part was about 10 degrees away was a solid dark black circular object. i first brushed this off as a weather balloon or hot air balloon but it was pitch black out and didnt over at all. furthermore the apparent distant between the two objects didnt seem to change either. unfortunately i couldnt get the black object on video. my wife was very scared and contemplative directly after. she wanted to get out of the area immediately. i was reassuring here that there is a logic answer to what we saw. but im not sure if there is at this point. ive never seen anything close to what we saw.
content.summary: Two circular stationary objects in sky. one with rotating colors one solid black

content.detailedDescription: Very cold night in december 1965 ,while slideing down our drive way ,a round object the size of the house flew over my head from south to north. it followed the horrizone until out of sight. the strange thing i remeber was how large it was and that the flames looked like a stasionary object not a object that was flying fast. i have been wanting to tell someone about this for a long time. i saw a documentary about the texburg insident ,and it match every thing that i saw . thanks [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Round ,as large as our home ,flameing and moveing fast across the horizone till out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home taking the garbage out with my fiance.

i like to look at the sky and i noticed the light. it looked like a head light shining toward us. i rubbed my eyes thinking that they were watery but looking at all the other stars out there, this was one of a kind. my fiance confirmed that it was really bright and that there were no other lights on it blinking. i didn't see any normal red or blue blinking lights like a plane.

it hovered for a minute, and then it started to move toward my left. as it was moving i could tell that it was definitely faster than a plane becauser there were definitely some in the air at the time. as it was moving away the light seem to turn away and as it sped up it disappeared. kind of like how a cars tailights would disappear driving away into the distance.

soon after you can hear a plan/jet come toward us and then toward the light. it circled back and that was the end of it.
content.summary: Saw a bright light, like it was facing me, moved faster and away like looking at a car drive away into the sky and disappears

content.detailedDescription: I left work after finishing up on the 2nd shift and stopped to get gas in town. i remember thinking the weather was pretty clear and comfortable that night. probably between 60 to 75 degrees fahrenheit. i left the gas station and around 1 1/2 miles later i was at a series of sharp curves just prior to entering a wooded area on my road. as i came around the bend i saw the triangular craft with solid orange orbs at the points and a blinking light in the middle hovering around 50 to 75 ft. over the tops of the trees. i guess the object was around 100 to 200 ft. long and half as wide. the appearance of it made me first freeze then my mind began to race. i stopped my car as soon as possible and was able to prevent myself from being located directly below the object. looking up at the underneath of it i was a little afraid and definetly in shock. what was to happen next as it quickly became clear to me that the technology my eyes were looking at was without a doubt capable of being fatal too me or anything around it. i also had a slight feeling of lost time. i was probably sitting in my car with it parked in the middle of the road staring at this craft for about 8 mins., desperately trying to wrap my mind around the dark colored objects underneath on the bottom of it along with the brightness of the orange orbs. i tried but couldnt recognize any of the ships parts from other mechanical objects i recognize which just continued to startle but later amaze me. at about the four mins. remaining mark i realized it hovered there and id heard entirely no sounds from the ship. the object was so clearly differently composed from anything i had ever seen before i continued to realize. it wasnt making any noticeable sounds but how? it should have been impossible for that to be true due to the size of the craft and how close i was located to it i shouldve heard it. i then once again tried to recognize any of the objects on the outside underneath of the craft to help me understand how this object could float there so idly and seemingly effortlessly. at this point i guess i had been looking at the craft in fear and amazement for about 12 mins. it then moved away and out of my eye sight maneuvering in a "z" like pattern incredibly fast and was gone without a trace. i assume it had to be faster than the speed of light.
content.summary: Late night craft sightingtrianglular three orange orbs one center blinking white light 06/2007

content.detailedDescription:
This happened many years ago. we were outside, east of wolf point mt. it was about 11pm late august the year was 1984-5. present at the time, other than myself, was my wife, and daughter. i noticed 3 bright spots in the distance 1-5 miles distant to the north. they could have been stars low on the horizon accept they were slowly moving together west then back to the east as well as north and south. i and my family were just off hwy 2 about 10 miles east of wolf point mt. they, the lights, seemed to be, for lack of better explanation, looking for something. i say this because i cant imagine what else they would have been up to. i will describe further.
the lights would hover in place, perhaps 1-3 hundred ft. above the ground arraigned inline from east to west, for some minutes equidistant from one another. then one on one of the ends would "shoot" away. if it were the one on the east end of the trio, it would go east then immediately the one on the west end would go west the one in the center remained. then within minutes they would suddenly with great speed, reappear back in their original positions. they moved forward toward the south then back toward the north always inline and equidistant. the lights always did the same thing shooting away then coming back together, the center one always remaining. they did this for many hours as we watched. the routine of these lights did not alter from the above, until it did. it was approximately some where between 2 and 3 am when the routine of these lights changed. we had watched for hours and were getting tired and bored with what was going on when one of the lights, the center one, came forward toward us. i kept thinking it would never get close enough for us to see it clearly. i kept think it would certainly stop, but it didnt. it slowly approached us to within 50ft. it hovered 20 to 30ft above the ground. it was very bright yellow orange color, perhaps 30ft in diameter. it hovered for maybe 10 minutes. it seemed to be watching us as we had watched them. then it went back to the north with the other two ufos perhaps 1 mile away and they simply and suddenly went away from view. i say that because they just vanished. they didnt speed away. they just disappeared.
i dont know how many attention seekers you get telling theyre stories or how many false stories you get from people. while in the annuals of ufo lore this incident may not be notable. it is however absolutely truthful! one tends not to believe ufo stories until one encounters something he cant explain. at no time did i or my family feel threatened. we were to the contrary amazed! thank you
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 glowing disc objects moving west to east over many hours one observed from 1-3 miles away one came to us within 50ft appeared to observe us for 5-10 minutes then left

content.detailedDescription:
About 2 or 3 days ago, i was sitting on my laptop at home playing a video game in my apartment (on a high floor so a good view). my brother went to the outdoor balcony, he then yelled at me "bro there's ufos in the sky!" i ran to the window by the balcony and saw in a distance 5 balls of light that seemed to be in a 'v' formation. they seemed to be hovering above the ocean. there was what seemed to be a loud aircraft sound in the vicinity when i stepped out into the balcony to get a clearer view, although i was not sure whether this was coming from the commercial airliner that was flying in the air at the same time, although the sound seemed a bit louder and slightly different from the usual commercial airliners that fly past and almost nothing like a helicopter, as well as the fact that the sound came earlier than the airliner seen (i live next to logan airport so seeing planes / helicopters is an every day occurrence although within my 4 years of living here - im a student from the uk) i have never seen a formation like that from my apartment nor have i seen aircraft behave in that way nor have i seen 5 hovering together at the same time. when i first noticed it i noticed it just looked odd, but i thought it could be helicopters from the way the lights of these objects were flickering although there was absolutely no sound present similar to a helicopter that would suggest that. 

when i first saw them they appeared to be in an organized formation but as they moved it was not so organized. at first i was very surprised when i saw the objects, not panicked or frightened just very intrigued. i was going through the things in my mind of what it could be, the most reasonable being helicopters, although i have never seen that before. as my brother was taking photos of them on my phone and some video, they began moving off to the left slowly, one faster than the others. the object furthest to the left disappeared behind the view of a building while the others very slowly followed although i did not see them actually go behind any buildings, they were still in the same sort of spot. since they broke their organized formation and traveled off to the side in what i assume is the direction of the airport i assumed they must have been aircraft that belong to logan airport or something, so after about 5-10 minutes of watching them i went back inside having lost a bit of interest and faith that they were from outter space.

this morning i woke up and decided to watch space shuttle videos on youtube as i am interested in space. i came across some ufo videos which then reminded me of the incident i witnessed in the sky about 3 days ago. this caused me to search "lights in the sky over boston" videos on youtube. i came across a video titled "ufo lights over abington, ma usa heading to boston" depicting balls of flickering light in the sky being filmed by a passenger in a car. although the video was uploaded october 17 2012 i was shocked because the objects in the video had a very similar resemblance to the objects i saw. i have attached photos and video.

i understand mufon must get thousands of ufo witness accounts but if you end up viewing this and think it is credible as being a legitimate unidentified flying object please dont hesitate to contact me as i would be happy to know too. (the video i attached had to be cut slightly shorter than its original length in order to have it sent to my email so it could be saved on my laptop and uploaded here - i have the full video on my iphone but the software on iphone requires me to cut the video short in order to be able to send it over email) - all video / photos were taken on iphone - i have more photos if you like.

thanks,

sam.
content.summary: 5 flickering balls of light hovering in the sky over the ocean, then appear to move very slowly in a line.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my 15 minute break at work when i noticed this object. for the last few months i've seen this same star like object from my homr witch is just 5 minutes from where i work. for some odd reason i decided to take a picture of it, zoom in and thought u guys could tell me what this is. it comed around almost daily, same time just before sunset.
content.summary: Sphere like with v-shape lights

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home i saw a bright green light (like a starburst) soared over the treeline of our neighborhood moving horizontally sw around 6pm.  my wife was traveling in her car three miles ne behind my location and saw the same thing plus another green light that seemed to be falling at an angle towards the ground in the distance.

at first i thought it was a fireworks rocket, but i noticed it was travelling horizontally across the sky.  it was pretty large for fireworks and it was very bright. it did not leave a trail, there was no sound, and it did not explode.  it soared over the three line where i lost sight of it.

later, i mentioned my sighting to my wife and she said she saw the same thing i saw as she was driving on the highway about three mile behind me.  she said she saw an additional light that seemed to be falling to the ground at an angle.  she paid more attention to this light because she was wondering it was a plane or something about to crash into the ground.  however she didn't see any impact after losing sight of it.
content.summary: A bright green light soared over the treeline moving sw around 6pm.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were walking out to the car, facing south around 6:45pm on december 7th.  something moving very quickly in the sky caught my eye.  it was about the size of a large star or planet, moving quickly from the se toward us. it was moving so fast i assumed it had to be an airplane, but it just wasn't close enough and it didn't have light like an airplane. as it moved toward us (north), it flashed green, red, and white. then it got noticeably brighter, then it disappeared completely. we both stood in the yard, awestruck. we would have thought it was a meteor or something, but it was moving very much like an aircraft, and not nearly as quickly as any meteor i have ever seen.
content.summary: Star like light moved north, then flashed lights, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Driving up my street spotted two lights near venus, they disappeared then saw two more in the south eastern part of the sky, they disappeared as well. saw another one alone in the south western part of the sky. 

throughout a period of 45 minutes they would appear in random parts of the sky and would disappear.
content.summary: Lights in the sky traveling very close together, appeared as two then disappeared showed up again miles away, then disappeared then showed up as two and merged into three.

content.detailedDescription: My wire and i went outside to look at our xmass lights when she noticed a bright red light in the s/w direction. i went and got my binoculars and observed the red light glowing bright and the dim. the round light seemed to change to have something sticking out from the right side, hard to say since the object was some miles away. after about five minutes this object still staionary just turned light white and dimming out. this object seemed to be lower than  the farthest mountain range to my west. also there were military fight jets flying around this night, which is not unusual for our skys. there always flying around.
content.summary: .Glowing bright and dim reddish light staitonary then slowly turning white & disappearing

content.detailedDescription: i was standing outside with my father when he says, hey i found your triangle! asi looked into the sky i saw three dim orange lights in the shape of a triangle and moving very fast. there were no clouds in the sky and just as it was about to disapear it whent straight up and was gone.
content.summary: Three lights in a perfect triangle came from the north to the south and flew straight up.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west bound on clyde rd just east of argentine rd in deerfeild township wed. evening on my way home from work and seen a green ball appear and streak across the sky from my left to directly in front of me. the object  appear and  disappeared within about a second. i was amazed that i actually foe the first time had seen a  legitimate ufo.  this happened only about 2 hours ago and i still can't believe that i seen a green orb streak the sky and just disappear and defy mans abilities in the sky. i have never witnessed something out of no where just show up and then just completely just go away like it was turned off like a switch. it was like a shooting star only it was no higher than the clouds. only thing i do know is that i feel a little bit different now having seeing with my own eyes
content.summary: Green orb streaking across the west sky in deerfeild township 12/11/13 at about 6 p.M.

content.detailedDescription: This bright ufo in the sky appeared yesterday on december 10 and has appeared again today december 11 the object had flashing lights and i looked with binoculars and saw there was lights in a circular fashion around the outside the object rised and dropped slowly and then eventually shot away to the right it must have been going 30,000 mph
content.summary: A strange very very bright light in the ssky just above the tree line.The object then shot of too the right at suck a speeed u could hardly see it

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was on the school bus around 7 am and was looking out the widow and thought it was a meteor, and took the piture. she thought it was a meteor 
and thought she would take a pix of it cause i am a meteor hunter. it was stationary and then decended slowly down. then it decended and was gone.
content.summary: Look like a sun with a solid  center , round with a glow around it, no smoke trail

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday evening my daughter and i stepped out of the house and stood in front in our driveway just chitchatting about life. after a few minutes we were looking at the sky commenting on how blue/clear it was when we saw what appeared at first to be a skywriter. i didn't think too much of it  but a couple of moments later took a second glance at it noted something that looked very peculiar. there was a long vapor trail but the weird thing was the vapor trail started what appeared to be a few hundred yards in front of the first craft. there were three crafts the first and third seem to be very similar if not identical the third was very easy to see was trailing the first two they were all on the line. the first craft was cigar shaped but mostly shrouded by the vapor trail that was making in front of the craft. the middle craft (if it was a craft) appeared to us is just a small star or real bright light we were never able to make out any craft shape. but all three maintained the same distance pretty much from one another flying in a straight line through the entire flightpath that we witnessed over a period of probably 3 or 4 min. when we first noticed it they were descending towards my house from the north west. they took a bend over us probably 1000 yards or a couple of miles infront and over us. and then ascended in the northwest. my daughter and i stood in total amazement watching it disappear into the skies. when i say it, they were definitely three different objects. with regard to the objects the first and third were definitely crafts which made absolutely no noise they left and incandescent vapor trail. the thing that caught my eye at first was that the vapor trail look unlike any skywriter i've ever seen. with a skywriter the vapor trail is tight like a ballpoint pen immediately behind the craft. then it looks more like a paint brush stroke as you get thousands of yards away from the craft. this was totally different. the width of the vapor trail in front of the first vehicle was the same with as the entire trail. when i started looking closer it was obvious that this wasn't the skywriter. the first craft i made out was the one shrouded in the beginning of the vapor trail. then i quickly noticed another cigar shaped craft what appeared to be several thousand yards in trail. it was either lit up with lights or had a highly reflective metal exterior. it was too far away to make out any more detail than that. they were not any conventional type of aircraft which we see plenty of in the same area. there were no navigational lights or wings and the weird thing was the middle craft must've been either very very small where was the craft of all. but it did maintain the same distance throughout the entire flightpath even acid vent in front of our house and back up to its ascent and emitted a starlike glow the entire time.
content.summary: Three crafts flying in line but few hundred yds apart, first craft had vapor trail starting in front

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:00 am on may 23, 2013, my friend and i began hiking mt. san jacinto from the bottom 200 ft. el. to the top 10,800 ft. el. we planned the trip around the full moon because of our all night hike. at 3:10 am my friend and i were at about 6000  ft of elevation. due to our position on the east side of the mountain, the moon had already set. it was pitch dark where we were besides our flash lights. we couldnt even see the lights from palm springs because we were seperated by a mountain. suddenly while looking south east towards the santa rosa mountains we spotted two objects. i noticed the objects because they were brightly colored and in a location where there are no houses, roads, cars, trails or anything for that matter. when i first noticed the lights i thought they were either a night hiker, a car or a house.

there were two crafts, positioned about 3/4 mi. apart, hovering around 750 ft. the objects both had bright flashing lights. the craft that had 3 lights was south east of my location. the lights all had separate colors but they blended together so their true color was indistinguishable. perhaps red yellow and blue. the other object which was south of my position had one main light and another light that periodically illuminated. the main light seemed like a bright white light. both crafts hovered in exact synchronization despite their distance  between each other. they seemed to be moving up and down and side to side. the object with 3 lights seemed to be the dominate craft because it was in more of an open area and when it would move, the other craft mocked its positioning while it was deeper in the indian canyons. it appeared as if tbey were looking for something.

my friend and i, of course being skeptics, questioned every bit of rational to explain this situation. we watched them for about a half an hour. by the time we decided to continue with our hike, we were affirmative to the fact we had witnessed two ufos. despite our visual sightings, both of us had seperately felt that they could feel us watching them. during our sighting we felt that the lights sensed our presence. after the sighting we disclosed in confidence in each other that we had sensed strange sensations which internally translated to the feeling of them being aware of us. after 30 minutes 3:10 -340 am of our sighting we continued on our hike. by 4:00 am the lights were gone.
content.summary: Witnessed two objects with glowing lights hovering and moving in sync while seperated by a mile.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i, along with our 2 year old son where out night fishing for catfish on the james river in an area known as monacan park. this small section of river weaves between two small mountain ranges. we were tucked away just on the other side of the river bend, and at the base of one of the ranges of mountains where the train track runs, facing in the direction of the other range. the outline of the other ridge could be seen as there was some light from the moon. 
 
i happen to be looking in that direction when a bar of solid light came very slowly from behind the very top of the mountain as if it were coming in a straight line from that direction. it moved very slowly with no sound at all.  my husband and i both watched it, keeping our eyes on it the whole time.I could just barely make it out but it seemed like i could see the shape of the object above the lights. it was dark/black and had a curve to the top of it. i could not see the bottom at all. once it got to the very top of this mountain's tree line it seemed to change direction and head back the other way. like it came to the edge just enough to see the reflection of light in the river. 
it lasted maybe a minute to two minuets and we were both just sort of shocked by it. we looked at each other and were like "what was that?!" we didn't know what to say or do about it. we didn't know what it was as it made no sound and had no other lights to indicate that it was a plane or any other type of aircraft. 

i have submitted a photo map from google earth and have included pin points and the path it appeared to have followed.
content.summary: Object hovering at tree top level over small mountain range.

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog out around 8;55 am on 12-11-13 to wait for my daughters school bus. she is in middle school and rides the ese bus because she has special needs. her school does not start till 9:45 am. i tied the dog to the porch rail and heard an airplane so i looked up. the planes come pretty low here since we are between the airport and the navy base. the plane was headed like it just took off from the airport. it was obvious it was a passenger plane. like i said they fly close here. it was headed south. i kept looking at the sky. i always do, because i believe and i want to see and meet anyone or anything new. i looked northwest and saw something white. it was so far away i thought it was a star. but i thought the sun was too bright to see a star that well. i noticed it was moving. i opened the door and told my daughter to come out. i pointed it out to her. she said it was just a star or a satellite. i said stars and satellites can't be seen in this sun lite and it's moving too fast. there was no sound at all since the plane had gotten out of earshot. it stopped and i ran in and got the binoculars. when i came back there was a red object coming from the east. the white object stopped and the red one went west in front of the white one. holding finger distance between them it was like 6 inches if you spread the thumb and index finger to measure. the red one passed the white one in front of it. the white one started going again towards the southeast. i looked through the binoculars and the white one had a solid greenish-yellow light covering the entire bottom surface with a small silver outer rim. the light was steady and continuous. the red object stopped and turned like a v shaped turn not a wide curve like a plane would have to do. it went southeast after the white object, as if chasing it. i looked through the binoculars, it too was star like, and it was just like the other one only it had a pale reddish light with a silver like outer rim. i could not really gage a shape. they were so far away they were like stars. but stars don't stop and change directions and follow other objects. i wouldn't think a satellite would either. my daughter kept saying it was stars or satellites because she was not going to admit what she saw and have people call her coo-coo at school. she said she could not deny some of the things she had seen before though. she told me not to show her anything like that again. i'm like, "but i want them to come say hello to me!" we couldn't get the camera in time. oh yeah! they both disappeared at the same time by shooting straight up. just "poof" gone with the red on following the white one!!! my daughter was like, "where did they go?" i said, "straight up!" kept looking, but they were gone. my daughter is a high functioning autistic. she is in main stream classes and hangs with the regular kids. she is very smart, she just processes things different and sucks at math, but she is on a 12th grade reading level.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 objects. one white, one red. white one hovered a second then red one crossed it and turned to follow it.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to return a movie to the store on my bike i got to dundas st beside the police station and pizza pizza and waited for traffic so i could cross i looked up to my left because this really bright star caught my attention it looked kinda low to be a star i thought it was a plane a little sesna so i waited for him to move and he didnt so i crossed the street went into the store dropped off my movie rented another one paid and went back out to go home and check on the light i decided to go up dundas st heading west on my bike to keep an eye on it ,  it started going backwards with me i stop at the lights on dundas and wellington st and stood there looking in the west south west direction it was above the ontario works building i watched it for 10 mins in that time i watched it pulse really bright and then reallly dim i went home heading north i got a hundred feet and i noticed it was following me just behind my left shoulder i could see it level to me like if i looked to my left in the sky he was there not behind me i stoped at the 100 feet mark then went home probably another 125 feet he stopped there with me i ran upstairs to get my dad he came out and showed him he didnt think anything of it so i told him watch he will follow us so we started walking back up wellington st (south) back towards dundas we stop at the the place where i stop just before i got home and it followed us to that spot we stood there looking at it for 5 mins then it dimmed out to a pin head red light then went up like 2 feet then vanished
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like star and a plane that is coming at you head on at night

content.detailedDescription: During the time of the event approximately at 4:30am, i was at home and watching tv because i wasn���t tired. i decided to smoke a cigaret on the balkony. it was very windy outside and the clouds moved very fast and that fascinated me so i continued watching them. among them i spoted some lights but was able to identify them as airplanes because of their shape, lights positioning, flight path and direction. than those 6 lights in a triangular formation symetricaly alligned, 3 of them in the corners and 2 of them in the middle of their sides and one little red light in the middle came out of nowhere. i thought that was just a star formation that was hidden behind the clouds but than i realized that those lights except the red one in the middle were pulsating much stronger than the stars and moving to the west and than back to the east and sometimes just hovering on the same spot. the weird thing was that when hovering, the lights in the middle moved to the left and to the right and while doing this the whole triangle rotated. than it stoped and moved and than again and again. i observed it approximately for an hour and a half until the clouds came and i lost the view. i wasn���t able to do any footage because on my camera those lights were blured and it looked like nothing. if necessary i could do a sketch.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 glowing lights in the sky in triangular shape, drasticly changing directions

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work and turned on the radio. now radio station (102.3 fm) announced that a fireball was observed flying north to south over edmonton and it was still visible in the south sky. i looked outside and sure enough i could see it. it was getting dark, it was between 4:30 pm and 5:00pm, the sky was overcast and no stars were visible. but this object was clearly visible, beaming bright and appeared to be sitting over leduc, a community to the south of edmonton, alberta. being a former mufon investigator, i grabbed my camcorder and took a few pictures and a short video. i did not have time to set up my telescope and night visio equipment. definitely looked like an et vehicle. it was moving a bit when i first saw it but then stayed stationary.
content.summary: Ufo over leduc

content.detailedDescription: Spotted a red stationary object with fuzzy white and yellow colors circulating around the red center. it was just under the overcast cloud cover directly to the south of my house. i had watched it for 2 to 3 minutes and then it was gone.
content.summary: Red stationary object with yellow edges just below cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north heading home when i noticed a cool bright blue "led" type light zipping by the night sky. it flew past my line of sight from east to west. at first i thought it was a helicopter flying low and fast, so i thought nothing of it. i was approximately a block away from my house when i noticed that the light changed direction and there where multiple blue and red lights, with one dim white light in the middle of it. i made a left towards my court and i noticed the "lights" got brighter. now the "lights" were heading north west. mesmerized, i observed it weaving and zigzagging north west. i parked, got out of my car, and i immediately called my wife. i called her for 2 reasons, 1) i needed a witness and 2) make her believer. i know for a fact that if i told her i saw another ufo, she would tell me that i'm crazy. as i got her on the phone to come out, the object was flying everywhere, stopped on a dime, hovered up, dropped rapidly, floated down, and the lights dimmed. i heard my wife coming out and the object was still there. she noticed what i noticed. i also saw the object(s) doing barrel rolls and loopty-loops. my wife's 1st impression was, "that's a remote controlled helicopter..." the lights were right in front of her and she was still in disbelief. we noticed the lights go behind our neighbors house and then reappeared. it didn't technically go behind our neighbors house, but from our point of view...It seemed like it went behind our neighbors house. it was too cold for her to be outside because she was wearing her pj's so she went back inside. i was standing in the middle of my driveway still observing it. i couldn't tell how far or close it was because i just had my eyes checked by the optometrist. they dilated my eyes yesterday, (monday, dec. 9th, 2013), so my eyes were adjusting. (i have 20/20 vision by the way). as i was observing the lights/object(s), i really didn't feel anything besides excitement. i thought to myself that i've been seeing these "objects/lights" quite frequently since i moved to livermore back in 2007. i felt that it got colder and my skin felt like it was tingly. tingly as in pins and needles. i noticed the object hovered up and slowly headed towards the clouds, but before it hit the clouds the lights just turned off. ive been walking in front of my house to see anything, but saw nothing. i went to my backyard and didn't notice anything. i feel like i may see more lights and or objects sometime in the near future.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cross,   Diamond,   Egg,   Flash,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Not normal

content.detailedDescription: 4 objects in pic that was not seen with eyes
content.summary: Was outside on patio of where i work at longhorns playing with my new iphone was taking pic of clouds when looking at second pic saw four objects that i did not see with my eyes but that don't surprised me cause i have bad eye sight

content.detailedDescription:
I had taken a day off from work on monday december 2nd. a little after 2 pm i was by my back door and looked out the window. i noticed a persistent vapor trail materializing across the cloudless sky, basically east to west, passing just south of my house. i couldn't see a plane! a long white trail of white material was forming across the sky, as if being emitted by a plane!! i ran and grabbed my camera and got several shots of the phenomenon, the included image the first taken. the sky was slightly hazy, but cloudless. the vapor trail persisted much longer than other planes, all visible (and recorded) passing by which dissipated about 30 lengths behind such planes. this east to west vapor trail persisted hundreds of plane lengths, although, again, no plane nor craft could visually nor photographically be detected.

i recorded this same phenomenon on november 27th, 2010, 4:28 pm, and reported it to mufon - it can be found with a search. in comparison you would note that the vapor trail appears to be at the same height and traveling in the same direction as this event. now as then, i report this phenomenon in the strict sense of reporting an unidentified flying object. i also report this as circumstantial evidence that an "invisible" craft is ejecting material into the air over st. louis on some soft of regular basis. each time i happened to witness and record these events by chance, where, statistically, this event must be happening in a much shorter periodic time period than every 3 years, as if one time wouldn't be enough to be disconcerting :)
content.summary: Vapor trail materialized over st. louis from no visible craft

content.detailedDescription:
Located 2 old boxes of slides i had for sometime from a reporter in 1958
when viewed there are images of ufos and men in black with much more.
took them to be developed into pictures but could not since nasa had the
rights marked on the slides they said. is it o.K. if i attach them before
someone looks at them first.? there is a lot and they can only be photographed from a camera to a slide projector screen.
content.summary: The event took place when  put some reporters old slides from 1958 in the view master ..All of these slides some black and white show ufos from different places one you can tell is on a world war battlefield taken from a trench..Men in black..More

content.detailedDescription: I've had many sightings of amber orbs over a 3 week period sitting on my back patio facing queen creek and east mesa area. they morph around the sky one will turn into 3 sometimes 6. others times two or three will hover for several minutes once a friend and i watched 2 hover for a half an hour. no explanation have called faa and surrounding airports.We were both in shock and awe as we knew we were witnessing something truly amazing. no fear whatsoever. they will turn off and on like they are still there but i just can't see them.
content.summary: Witnessed several orb over several days morphing around turning on and off

content.detailedDescription: Similar to a firework or flare, no sound was heard. had zoomed in many times, didn't notice much with my eyes, camera caught what i couldn't see. as soon as i started recording got dimmer. seemed to explode or emit a cloud of gas or debris. as soon as it became invisible on camera i heard a loud bang, don't know what it was from. as soon as i seen it i took photos then recorded it. it stayed very bright on camera for about 9 seconds, then as i started recording it started dimming. i couldn't tell if it vanished or not, but the camera wasn't able to pick it up anymore.
content.summary: Similar to a firework or flare, no sound was heard, got dimmer, seemed to explode.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a uk submarine berthed at port canaveral october 1997.A few of the crew were waiting for the sonic boom on the shuttle re entry. i looked straight up at the clouds and saw a silver ball between the clouds which were slow moving ,as the sun went down and turned the clouds orange the object turned orange as well so it was at the same altitude as the clouds.After the long awaited sonic boom i watched the object zig zag then rapidly climb vertically ,it was out of sight in about 3 seconds.....In 2007 i was talking to 2 guys from nasa about air purification in the shuttle as this is important in a submarines ( this conversation is the result of an incident on a submarine ). at the end of the conversation i mentioned the sighting during the shuttle re entry, the reply was " they are there quite often " i could not get anymore info and they left my office.
content.summary: Observed during shuttle re entry 1997
